24/7 patrol

BICYCLE PATROL

REQUEST A QUOTE

DO I NEED BIKE PATROL?

Bicycles work well in gated neighborhoods, large school campus, or a large shopping center. Bikes allow our officers to reach more places in no time.


Guards perform bicycle and foot patrol to effectively increase officers’ presence. This increased presence can deter and reduce crime, and provide a safer environment for your family, employees and clients.

WHAT IS BICYCLE PATROL?

Our company’s Bicycle patrol service is an effective decision considering the advantages you will have at the most competitive rate.

24/7 Patrol’s officers will be able to ride around your property in areas that aren’t accessible for large vehicles and ride in random patterns. This patrol service is as effective as the other we have mentioned, it all depends on your needs.

WHY 24/7  PATROL?

24/7 Patrol is dedicated to protect you. We’ll listen to your needs, identify your security goals and develop a customized security plan to help you succeed.

 

Also, you can count on a professional management who will give you constant reports, keep you updated at every moment and provide you outstanding results.

Better security coverage

Visible crime deterrent

Highly trained patrol officers

Quick response

Cost-effective solution
